SQL.LOAD: SELECT upload_session_id, record_number, validation_errors, company_id, dealer_id, contract_type_id, effective, expiration, commissions_percent, marketing_percent, admin_expense, profit_percent, loss_cost_percent, currency_id, type_of_marketing_id, type_of_equipment_id, type_of_insurance_id, min_replacement_cost, warranty_max_delay, net_commissions_id, net_marketing_id, net_taxes_id, deductible, waiting_period, funding_source_id, edit_model_id, dealer_markup_id, auto_mfg_coverage_id, restrict_markup_id, layout, suspense_days, cancellation_days, comment1, fixed_esc_duration_flag, policy, replacement_policy_id, coinsurance_id, participation_percent, id_validation_id, claim_control_id, rating_plan, currency_conversion_id, currency_of_coverages_id, remaining_mfg_days, acsel_prod_code_id, cancellation_reason_id, full_refund_days, auto_set_liability_id, deductible_percent, coverage_deductible_id, ignore_incoming_premium_id, repair_discount_pct, replacement_discount_pct, ignore_coverage_amt_id, backend_claims_allowed_id, edit_mfg_term_id, acct_business_unit_id, installment_payment_id, days_of_first_pymt, days_to_send_letter, days_to_cancel_cert, deduct_by_mfg_id, penalty_pct, clip_percent, is_comm_p_code_id, base_installments, billing_cycle_frequency, max_installments, installments_base_reducer, past_due_months_allowed, collection_re_attempts, include_first_pmt, collection_cycle_type_id, cycle_day, offset_before_due_date, ins_premium_factor, extend_coverage_id, extra_mons_to_extend_coverage, extra_days_to_extend_coverage, allow_different_coverage, allow_no_extended, num_of_claims, claim_limit_based_on_id, days_to_report_claim, marketing_promo_id, cust_address_required_id, first_pymt_months, allow_multiple_rejections_id, deductible_based_on_id, pro_rata_method_id, pay_outstanding_premium_id, authorized_amount_max_updates, recurring_premium_id, recurring_warranty_period, allow_pymt_skip_months, number_of_days_to_reactivate, billing_cycle_type_id, daily_rate_based_on_id, allow_billing_after_cncltn, allow_collctn_after_cncltn, replacement_policy_claim_count, future_date_allow_for_id, ignore_waiting_period_wsd_psd, allow_coverage_markup_dtbn, num_of_repair_claims, num_of_replacement_claims, payment_processing_type_id, third_party_name, third_party_tax_id, rdo_name, rdo_tax_id, rdo_percent, policy_type_code, policy_generation_code, line_of_business_code, contract_upload_id, created_date, modified_date, created_by, modified_by FROM elp_contract_upload WHERE contract_upload_id = :contract_upload_id

SQL.LOAD_PREVALIDATED_CONTRACTS_FOR_UPLOAD: SELECT contract_upload_id, record_number FROM elp_contract_upload WHERE Upload_Session_id =:UploadSessionId ORDER BY record_number asc
